CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 18, 1939, pg. 14, reads: "Win or Lose - They're Real Pals! In victory or defeat, John Henry Lewis can always count on his dad.  in picture above, John and his father, John E. Lewis, talk over the past Louis battle and come to the conclusion that is was just one of those things.  The proud father says John's still a great fighter.  Which no one can deny."
TitMainTitle: Boxer John Henry Lewis posed with arm around his father, John E. Lewis
